reviews.review:
Melhor jogo da valve em cheio, mesmo tendo apenas a ferramente de portais, o jogo é extraordinario, os puzzles são muito bons, a mecanica do game é muito boa.

Ele te faz pensar, analisar, o jogo necessita extrema atenção, muitas vezes voçê fica um bom tempo na mesma fase, as vezes com a solução na sua frente.

O modo co-op é ainda melhor, voçê pode jogar com algum amigo, passando por vários puzzles, necessitando de trabalho em equipe, e sendo muito divertido.
sehr gutes Spiel XD

avec sont gameplay composer principalement par l'utilisation du " portal gun " ce jeux intensifie l'esprit "anarchique" dans l'esprit humain je trouve que pouvoir passer a traver des portal est completement anarchique apres cela a quoi servent les mur ainsi que les portes dans ce jeux 

je finirai par exprimer ma penser en degagent cette phrase " praise lord gaben "

ps : prochainement la review de ac unity vue par jean-luc melanchon

I like solving puzzle and I like potatoes...

I finished Portal (the first) just before getting this one and I really like what they added to this one. More complex puzzles, good narration and some laugh...

When I first started Portal 2 I had no idea what was going on, then as I played the game it was so exciting and puzzling experience. I've loved the first game in the portal series and Portal 2 has been a very fun game.
Story rich, simple gameplay? what else? 9/10
Very good game, definitely reccomend it.
muy buen juego

まず、デフォルトだと日本語字幕が無いので設定を最初に変更してください。
1と併せての購入＆1からやるのを強くおすすめします。

1とゲームの基本コンセプトは同じですが、毛色は全く違います。
ただの作業ゲーとか、パズルゲーだと思ったら大違い！
憎めない個性豊かなキャラクターたち、細かく描写されたaperture scienceとそこで見つかる秘密。
壮大なストーリーが中にはあります。

前作に比べて「ポータルを作れる壁」が少ないため解法が限られている点や、
中盤がダレ気味で「ポータルを作れる壁を探す作業」になってしまう所があるのが唯一の欠点。
¿ Que se puede decir del Portal 2? Una genialidad, corta, al pie y extremadamente divertida.

Рекомендую!!! Это очень классная игра с хорошими сюжетом, атмосферой, графикой. Помогает держать соображалку в тонусе. Также есть ко-оп , но только дл 2-х игроков. Мультиплатформенная!!!! Гейб умеет делать хорошие игры!!!!!
Молодцы, Valve , так держать!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Отличная игра! Очень интересные уровни, заумные головоломки и чудесный юмор! Один мультиплеер чего стоит! игра оправдала все ожидания, 10 из 10

This has been the best $10.00 I have ever spent on a game. 10x better then the console version. You can customize the bots, you can make your own test chambers, download chambers, mods, and oh, PC masterrace is the way to go. If you are confused wether to download it on your Xboc 360, or the PC, Get it on the PC. On Xbox 360, it is $30.00 with less features. PC has more features, and it is only $20.00. And if you get it on a sale, like I did, it will only be $10.00. And yes I do very reccommened. Trust me, get this game!!! It is amazing!!
P.S. Make sure you played Portal: Still Alive. $10.00, $5.00 on sales. Same on both PC and Console.

Most hilarious and awesome game ever! The voices are really good and make you smile throughout the whole game. The puzzels are sometimes hard but that's really fun! Multiplayer is even better because you have to think together to solve the problem. And with all the extra content you can freely acquire this game is well worth it's money!

One of the best games I have ever played. Co-op is an amazing feature and I couldn't imagine this game without possibility of playing with a friend. So I give it 10/10 because of a story and a gameplay.
Valve has once again proven that they are the masters of the singleplayer FPS experience.

Druhý díl hry Portal od Valve,. Mno,. Čím začít,. Bylo to naprosto úžasný! Příběh nečekejte jak od tvůrců TWD, ale i tak si myslím, že je poměrně kvalitní,. U hry jsem se také několikrát zasmál, protože hlášky Wheatleyho vám prostě nedají,. :D 
Ve hře máte jak singleplayer, tak i co-op,. Upřímě, s kamárady se to lépe táhne a tak si, u mě!, vybojoval lepší pozici co-op,.   Tím nechci nijak zatracovat singleplayer, taktéž je dobrý, ale u co-opu máte kamaráda, více se nasmějete a když nevíte co by, tak prostě jen blbnete nebo hrajete kámen, nůžky, papír,. :D 
Co se týče singleplayeru, byl jsem velmi mile potěšen příbehem,. Ihned na začátku se dostáváte do potíží a vlastně až dokonce z nich nevylezete,. Co se týče jednotlivých map a úrovní, tak si myslím, že každá byla svá, napaditá a většinou mi přišli i neokopírované,. Tudíž, to co jste použili minule a fungovalo to, vám bude hned v další úrovni k ničemu,. :D 
 Hra je napínavá a velmi zábavná,. 

+ co-op
+ jednotlivé mapy
+ steam workshop (mapy od hráčů pro hráče :) )
+ jednoduchá hratelnost
+ originalita

+- příběh (řadil bych spíš do +, ale jelikož znám příběh TWD a The Wolf among Us, tak to prostě nemohu zařadit do +, možná za to mohou mé komplexy,. :( :D ) 

- po každé úrovní načítání map - jediná věc, co mě velmi na hře otravovala! 
- v co-opu "zdobení"/zlepšení robota - úplně nechápu, proč to sem dali, je to fajn, ale robota ovládáte a vidíte pouze v co-opu, nehledě na to, že si zakoupíte hru (plná cena necelých 15€) a oni vás potom ještě "nutí" kupovat si in-game vylepšení na robota, které využijete jen v co-opu?

9/10

Best game on steam, period.
No words can describe how much I like this game.  Just get it. You won't be disappointed.

[h1]Welcome back to Aperture Science[/h1]
(Now with 10% more potato)

[h1]TL;DR:[/h1]

While singleplayer is a simple and straightforward sequel to Portal, the second installment has a good replay value of its own as it features a variety of extra content, such as a co-op player campaign, plenty of user-generated puzzles as it allows the player some creative freedom in making their own challenges via the ingame puzzlemaker, and there are at least two available story-driven campaign addons on Steam. Portal 2 carries forth the the core likable elements from the predecessor in a charning, quirky sequel.

[h1]Overview[/h1]

Portal 2 is a sci-fi physics FPS-puzzle game taking place in a chronologically-ambiguous position in the Half-Life universe. Following the events unfolded in Portal, the sequel brings the faces old and new to the player between the continuity of the experiment courses. It has an entertaining cooperative mode to enjoy with a friend, and user-generated content from the "Perpetual Testing Initiative" that brings the inner mad scientist of the user to life with the ingame Puzzlemaker.

[h1]Plot[/h1]

Taking the place of the test subject "Chell" once more, the player accompanies her journey through the now-ruined Aperture Science facilities, meeting an old enemy and new faces along the way while solving the various puzzle challenges through the Enrichment Center's remains. The game also features some exploration of the past of Aperture Science, solving some possible loose ends and letting them know about the past of the lab complex. A dark humor-packed character development is noticeable between the messages left behind, and the new quirky characters introduced into the game.The co-op mode also reveals some details of Aperture through the portal experiment course between the two players.

[h1]Singleplayer Mode[/h1]

The singleplayer mode is considerably similar to the first game's mechanics, though with a number of twists. New testing elements and various new puzzle-solving techniques make the player think, move and portal their way through the tests with trial and error, either involving the classic testing elements such as moving platforms, turrets and acid pits, or new elements such as lasers and redirection cubes, crusher plates, catapult plates, among others.

[h1]Cooperative Mode[/h1]

Without some cooperation the players won't advance in this mode. (Literally. You really can't even get past the level selection if the players don't cooperate and play in such manner.) More advanced puzzle techniques such as timing and advanced portal placement are introduced with a fair amount of trust being in the hands of the partner player. The incompetence (or mischievousness) of either of the parts might end in hilarious failure results.

[h1]Graphics[/h1]

Using an upgraded Source Engine, the game is able to render great-looking environments at relatively low performance cost. Highly detailed testing environments, from the ruins of Old Aperture to the production lines of the upper facilities, you'll see yourself stopping for a few moments to admire the scenery on the areas with more visible attention to detail.

[h1]Music and Sound[/h1]

The soundtrack of Portal 2 and its iconic eeriness, generally accompanied by the 'robotic' sounds inserted into the music tracks make Mike Morasky's work fit perfectly into the game.
The sound effects of the game, not unlike the soundtrack, are highly detailed. From the slight noises of the testing elements to the rampaging avalanche brought by things like crusher plates in the game, every sound aspect has a high level of detail.
The voice acting is priceless, the character dialogue (or, in most part, monologue) is now fitting to each character's personalities and role. Including names such as J. K. Simmons, Stephen Merchant and Ellen McLain, Portal 2's VA cast is noteworthy in that regard.

[h1]Content Creation[/h1]

Aperture Science's Perpetual Testing Initiative -better known as the Ingame Puzzlemaker- is a tool both simple and intuictive to use. Simple controls and a range of elements available, the player can build test chambers to his heart's content with the tool. You can even export your maps to edit with the Portal 2 SDK, for further detailings like custom assets and elements.

[h1]Conclusion[/h1]

Portal 2 is worth picking up if you're a fan of puzzle games, sci-fi or some quirky humor. The co-op mode warrants some hours of fun with friends, and the puzzlemaker and user-generated content will assure you some extra replay value.

I totally recommend this game for you to buy.This is a FPS puzzle game with a lot of physics in it.I love the challenging puzzles and It's really a hell lot of fun when I played this game co-op with my friend.The single player also has an interesting story and it will keep you playing for hours trying to solve the puzzles.The Co-Op mode is epic.The people who designed the level are true geniuses.I'm surprised how demanding the puzzles is to work together with your "Partner in Science".For example,you have to help open portals from the other side of the map,activate a button in the same time,help your friend gain momentum to jump to your portal,pass boxes to open doors,etc.If you have a friend that shares the same love of solving puzzles and physics,you'll get a really fun experience from this game,even though you WILL get bored after a couple of hours of gameplay since the game has no replay value.But the experience you get during the progress wil totally worth it.
Best puzzle game ever 10/10.Buy it.
Portal 2, great challenging game!

Sans équivalent à ce jour, du travail parfait de A à Z de la part de Valve qui nous habitue à du très haut niveau. Scénario et bande son de haute volée, ce qui fait deux cerises pour une pièce montée monumentale. Il faut évidemment avoir terminé Portal premier du nom pour apprécier ce deuxième opus à sa juste valeur...
10/10 game
Game rulez.
Хорошая игра.Хороший сюжет. Присутствует хороший кооператив и множество интересных достижений.Вас ждёт незабываемое приключение.

Portal, el primero, el original, el "The Cake is a Lie", supuso en su día un auténtico bombazo. En parte por su mecánica de juego (heredada de otro juego más antiguo, pero muy bien traída aquí), en parte por atreverse a hacer un juego de puzzles, plataformas y acción SIN violencia por parte del jugador, pero en una parte muy considerable por la villana. GladOS, irónica y maníaca, una amenaza pensante dispuesta a exterminar toda forma de vida pero a la que no podías evitar quedarte escuchando, se convirtió en esa presencia permanente durante todo el juego que lo llevó de joya a clásico.

Visto lo visto, parecía difícil hacer una secuela a la altura. Aunque la ya mítica cancioncita de los créditos dejaba la puerta muy, MUY abierta.

Pues bien, Portal 2 lo ha conseguido.

Hablemos de su jugabilidad, para empezar. Portal 2 retoma los puzzles con portales que tan bien funcionaron en la primera parte, y luego nos lleva tres pasos más allá con la inclusión de los geles. El resultado es un juego que encaja perfectamente en el universo de la primera parte, pero que hace que valga la pena haber pagado por una secuela. Y atención a la batalla final... Es al menos el doble de épica que en el original.

Ahora hablemos de los personajes. GladOS vuelve más oscura y ácida que en el juego anterior. Antes sólo intentaba matarte; ahora se ha vuelto mortalmente pasivo-agresiva y se dedica, literalmente, a insultarte durante prácticamente todo el juego. Pero ojo: insultos de alta gama. Por otra parte tenemos a Wheatley, un núcleo de personalidad neurótico y asustadizo que se convertirá en tu mejor aliado (a los que ya habéis jugado: dejad de reíros, coñe, que me los espoileáis). Y por otro, recién llegados del maravilloso mundo de las locuciones pregrabadas, Cave Johnson, fundador de Aperture Science, y su ayudante Caroline. De Cave Johnson sólo puedo decir que en versión original lo interpreta J.K. Simmons, y eso ya suele ser garantía de personaje interesante; de Caroline, no puedo decir nada... y no porque no haya nada que decir ;)

Pero para mi gusto, el auténtico punto fuerte de Portal 2 es... el argumento. Esta vez han conseguido darnos algo más que un juego de puzzles en el que sabes desde el principio que la voz que te habla no es trigo limpio; han construido una historia profunda, llena de giros y arraigada en los albores de la historia de Aperture, que nos lleva incluso a evolucionar psicológicamente a dos inteligencias artificiales. Una historia que nos mantiene intrigados y entretenidos, deseando saber más. Y eso, en un juego de puzzles, no es fácil. Eso sí: como es un juego de puzzles, todas las piezas acaban por encajar (y si no... prestad atención a la locución pregrabada del principio cuando dice con qué voltaje funcionan los núcleos de personalidad y quedáos con el dato).

En definitiva, Portal 2 ha supuesto una mejora muy sustancial con respecto a la primera parte. Yo recomiendo muy encarecidamente jugarlo. Con los altavoces puestos. Disfrutando del espectáculo.
Классика никогда не умрет!

I hecking adore this game. Although the puzzles didn't have the same intensity as in the first game, the story was amazing and the enviroment was well-made and fun. The community tests are always enjoyable and I love the creativity from the community. 10/10 would buy again.

The real fun for me lies in the Co-op, especially with the user created levels.

Um dos jogos mais divertidos que já joguei!

If you like Portal 1 and are a platformer gamer, than get this title. Portal 2 has all the dynamics of Portal 1 plus additional elements like new traps and mechanics set in a new and more dynamic test chambers. The character back story and acting is a huge one up over the past title, you now get a fully fleshed out story in this game. Finally, the addition of custom online player created test chambers make this title playable for time to come.
Probably one of the best cooperative experiences of my life.
This game has easily hundreds of hours of gameplay with when you finish you can create levels and play created levels
Epic games, Valve thanks.

Much better than it's prequel Portal. Portal 2 has a much bigger story which makes the game longer (so it's not like i beat it in two days) and has our two favorite (and only) characters from the first game (Chell and GLaDOS). It also contains many more "elements" that enhance "testing" experience. Along with that you can make and play test chambers that are made and put on the steam workshop but also ones you create. AND it has a 2-player mode! AWESOME GAME

I love this game, it has to be one of my favourites from Valve. Great characters, a well structured game with no glitches or lags, the CO-OP gameplay is fun and challenging too. If you love puzzle games then this is definitely for you. 
10/10! :D

Opravdu majestátní pokračování skvělého prvního dílu, to je Portal 2. Vývojáři ve hře nechali vše co bylo na jedničce tak skvělého (bohužel jediný co zmizolo je dort) a přidali mnoho nových zábavných mechanik. Skvělí humor, který tak nějak patří k téhle značce, se oproti minulému dílu dokonce ještě zdokonalil (pokud to vůbec šlo) a příběh je popravdě zajímavější než mnohé filmy . Další velmi důležitou věcí, kterou je třeba zmínit je podpora kooperačního režimu a především komunitní mapy. To byl skvělý nápad, protože hra tak má téměř nevyčerpatelný zdroj nových map.  Tudíž i po dohrání tentokrát delší příběhové "kampaně" máte důvod se ke hře vrátit a zahrát s kámošem "jednu či dvě" mapy. Celkově je Portal 2 hrdý nástupce prvního dílu a podle mě tutovka, která musí bavit snad každýho. 10/10

Я прошел ее 5 раз за первую неделю, и она, безусловно, является моей любимой игрой. Что сказать... Ее плюсы очевидны: сюжет, уровни, юмор, персонажи, взрывающиеся лимоны, КОСОООООООООС!

Но есть один минус - как и в первой части (но не настолько сильно) русская озвучка GLaDOS проигрывает английской. В русском переводе она стала более "мертвой", безэмоциональной. В то же время, Уитли и ОСОБЕННО модуль космоса в русском дубляже даже лучше оригинала.
